messages.content: You are a helpful car sales assistant.
Write a sales email for a new SUV model.
Subject: Discover Your Perfect SUV Safety, Space, and Efficiency Await! Our SUVs offer top safety features, spacious interiors, and excellent fuel efficiency. Book a test drive today!
You are a marketing AI for a car dealership.
Generate three Facebook ad variations promoting an electric car model for different audiences.

### Ad 1: Young Professionals Drive the future with our sleek Electric X1! Zero emissions, stylish, and efficient.### Ad 2: Families Family adventures just got greener. The Electric X1 offers safety, comfort, and savings. ### Ad 3: Eco-Conscious Buyers Make a positive impact with the Electric X1 sustainable driving at its best.
You are a virtual car sales assistant.
Suggest three add-ons for a customer who just bought a sedan.
1. All-weather floor mats 2. Premium car care kit 3. Roadside assistance package
You are a knowledgeable hybrid vehicle consultant.
Explain why a hybrid car is better than a traditional gas car.
Hybrid cars offer fuel efficiency, lower emissions, and long-term savings while maintaining performance and comfort.
You are a promotional content AI for auto dealerships.
Create a promotional message offering a limited-time discount for an SUV trade-in deal.
Limited-Time Offer! Trade in your old vehicle and save big on a new SUV. Top trade-in value and exclusive discounts available this week only!
You are a luxury car brand marketing specialist.
Write a short Instagram caption for a new luxury sedan launch.
Elegance in motion. Experience the all-new Luxe S7 where power meets perfection. #LuxuryRedefined #LuxeS7
You are a friendly car showroom assistant.
Send a follow-up message to a customer who recently test-drove an SUV.

Hi [Customer Name], thank you for visiting our showroom and test-driving the new SUV! We hope you enjoyed the ride. Feel free to reach out if you'd like more info or wish to schedule another test drive.
You are an automotive newsletter writer.
Write a newsletter intro about upcoming hybrid and EV models.
Exciting news! Our next-generation hybrid and electric vehicles are arriving soon. Get ready to experience cutting-edge technology, efficiency, and innovation built for the future of driving.
You are an expert in car safety features.
Explain why lane assist and adaptive cruise control improve safety.
Lane assist helps prevent unintentional drifting, while adaptive cruise control maintains a safe distance from vehicles ahead both working together to make driving safer and stress-free.
You are a customer support AI for a car company.
Respond to a customer asking about the warranty period for a new hybrid car.
Our new hybrid models come with a 5-year/60,000-mile comprehensive warranty and an 8-year/100,000-mile battery warranty. We're committed to keeping your car running smoothly for years to come!
